description.text: Normal Attack
Deal Physical DMG to an enemy. Has a 5 hit combo.
Charged Attack
Unleash 2 rapid sword strikes after a small delay. Uses Stamina.
Plunging Attack
Drop to the ground below, dealing Physical DMG on its way, and deal AoE Physical DMG upon impact.

originalDescription.text: Normal Attack
Perform up to 5 rapid strikes.
Charged Attack
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.
Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

description.text: Press
Summons a Solar Isotoma in front. Deals AoE Geo DMG on appearance.
Solar Isotoma
- Enemies within its range take AoE Geo DMG, scaled off Albedo's DEF, when they take damage. This effect can only happen once every 2 seconds
- Spawns a platform and lift players up a certain height when they stand on it. Only one such platform may exist at a time.
- Regarded as a Geo Construct.
- Only one created by Albedo himself can exist at a time.

originalDescription.text: Albedo creates a Solar Isotoma using alchemy, which deals AoE Geo DMG on appearance.
Solar Isotoma
When enemies within the Solar Isotoma zone are hit, the Solar Isotoma will generate Transient Blossoms which deal AoE Geo DMG. DMG dealt scales off Albedo's DEF.
Transient Blossoms can only be generated once every 2s.

When a character is located at the locus of the Solar Isotoma, the Solar Isotoma will accumulate Geo power to form a crystallized platform that lifts the character up to a certain height. Only one crystallized platform can exist at a time.
Solar Isotoma is considered a Geo construct.
Hold to designate the location of the skill.

description.text: Deal initial AoE Geo DMG to all enemies in front. When a Solar Isotoma is on the field, all enemies within its area will take extra AoE Geo DMG.
Damage from this Burst will not trigger Solar Isotoma's effect.

originalDescription.text: Under Albedo's command, Geo crystals surge and burst forth, dealing AoE Geo DMG in front of him.
If a Solar Isotoma created by Albedo himself is on the field, 7 Fatal Blossoms will be generated in the Solar Isotoma field, bursting violently into bloom and dealing AoE Geo DMG
Tecotonic Tide DMG and Fatal Blossom DMG will not generate Transient Blossoms.

description.text: Solar Isotoma's effect deal 25% more DMG to opponents whose HP is below 50%.

originalDescription.text: Transient Blossoms generated by Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma deal 25% more DMG to enemies whose HP is below 50%.

description.text: Using Elemental Burst increases the Elemental Mastery of nearby party members by 125 for 10s.

description.text: When Albedo crafts Weapon Ascension Materials, he has a 10% chance to receive double the product.

description.text: Solar Isotoma's effect regenerate 1.2 Energy for Albedo when triggered.

originalDescription.text: Transient Blossoms generated by Albedo's Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma regenerate 1.2 Energy for Albedo.

description.text: Solar Isotoma's effect grant Albedo one stack of Fatal Reckoning for 30s when triggered.
Fatal Reckoning
- Can be stacked for up to 4 times
- Activating Elemental Burst consumes all stacks, increasing its initial and extra damage by 30% of DEF for each stack consumed.

originalDescription.text: Transient Blossoms generated by Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma grant Albedo Fatal Reckoning for 30s:
Each stack of Fatal Reckoning increases DMG by of Albedo's DEF.
The effect stacks up to 4 times.
Unleashing Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide consumes all stacks of Fatal Reckoning, increasing the DMG dealt by the Tectonic Tide and Fatal Blossoms based on the number of stacks consumed.
